title: Core Banking Session Timeout Resolution
content: Increase connection pool timeout parameter in core-banking-auth-config.yaml from 30 to 120 seconds. Redeploy auth service.

title: Mobile Push Notification Scaling
content: Configure auto-scaling policy on notification workers to scale out at 70% queue depth during 08:00-20:00 AEST.

title: Payments DB Index Rebuild Process
content: Execute sp_reindex_payments_tables during weekly maintenance window Saturday 02:00 AEST. Monitor query plan cache post-rebuild.
